slotProps.description: The props used for each component slot.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

landscape.nodeName: the root element in landscape orientation

contentWrapper.nodeName: the contentWrapper element (which contains the tabs and the view itself)

slotDescriptions.actionBar: Custom component for the action bar, it is placed below the picker views.
slotDescriptions.layout: Custom component for wrapping the layout. It wraps the toolbar, views, action bar, and shortcuts.
slotDescriptions.toolbar: Custom component for the toolbar. It is placed above the picker views.
